> 
> Scavenger lands safely on the ground, transforming back to robot 
mode and looking around, seeing if anyone other than Hook was hurt.


::LONG HAUL::

  Long Haul lands ungracefully on the ground, not sure why the 
Constructicon joining never stayed. He grunts as he hits the ground 
then brushes the dust from himself before seeing how his 'brothers' 
fared.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
